name: Videorecensione di Rome: Total War
text: The video articles of Multiplayer.it The video articles of Multiplayer.it are our way of inaugurating a new season of editorial production of Multiplayer.it, dedicated to Premium Gold subscribers (link), which will complement and enrich (not replace) the classic one, made up of text and images static. Now the family of video articles has achieved its recognized status and the new milestone is before your eyes: live video from the game and the editor's voice (and face) commenting on the moving images. From today on we will try to increasingly guarantee this new form of communication that we believe is more modern, suitable for the medium in which we move and now within everyone's reach thanks to the enormous diffusion that ADSL has had in the last twelve months. Here is the List of latest video articles: Burnout 3 Video Preview (Free) Lord of the Rings: Battle for Middle Earth Video Preview (Premium Gold Exclusive) Medal of Honor: Pacific Assault (EGN 2004 Version) Video Preview (Premium Gold Exclusive) World of Warcraft (Premium Gold Exclusive) PES 4 Video Preview: Xbox Versus PS2 Version (Premium Gold Exclusive) The Sims 2 Video Review (Premium Gold Exclusive) Metal Gear Solid 3 Video Preview (Premium Gold Exclusive) [VIDEO=310.300.c.s]https://www.multiplayer.it/streaming/rome_streaming.wmv[/VIDEO] For the high resolution version, the download link is this (about 25 mb).
